org.openmrs.module.reporting.dataset.def.name: HTS Client Intake
org.openmrs.module.reporting.dataset.def.description: Datasets from the HTS Client Intake Form
org.openmrs.module.reporting.dataset.def.sqlQuery: SELECT global_property.property_value as DatimCode, pid1.identifier as HTSClientCode, pid2.identifier as PepfarID, pid3.identifier as HospID, pid4.identifier as RecencyID, person.gender as Sex, DATE_FORMAT(person.birthdate, '%d-%b-%Y') as DOB, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,person.birthdate,enc.encounter_datetime) as AgeYearsAtVisit, DATE_FORMAT(enc.encounter_datetime,'%d-%b-%Y') as VisitDate, visit.visit_id as VisitID, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=166136,cn1.name, NULL)) as `KindOfHTS`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165839,cn1.name, NULL)) as `Setting`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165966,obs.value_text, NULL)) as `SettingOthersSpecify`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id= 165790,cn1.name, NULL)) as `FirstTimeVisit`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id= 165793,cn1.name, NULL)) as `TypeOfSession`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id= 165480,cn1.name, NULL)) as `ReferredFrom`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id= 1054,cn1.name, NULL)) as `MaritalStatus`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id= 160312,obs.value_numeric, NULL)) as `NoOfOwnChildrenLessThan5`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=5557,obs.value_numeric, NULL)) as `NoOfWives`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165794,cn1.name, NULL)) as `IsClientIdentifiedFromAnindexClient`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id= 165798,cn1.name, NULL)) as IndexType, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165859,obs.value_text, NULL)) as IndexClientID, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165976,cn1.name, NULL)) as `IsClientRetestingForResultVerification`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=166136,cn1.name, NULL)) as `PreviouslyTestedHIVNegative`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=1434,cn1.name, NULL)) as `ClientPregnant`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id= 165801,cn1.name, NULL)) as `ClientInformedAboutHIVTransmissionRoutes`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id= 165802,cn1.name, NULL)) as `ClientInformedAboutRiskFactorsForHIVTransmission`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id= 165804,cn1.name, NULL)) as `ClientInformedOnPreventingHIVTransmissionMethods`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id= 165884,cn1.name, NULL)) as `ClientInformedAboutPossibleTestResults`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id= 1710,cn1.name, NULL)) as `InformedConsentForHivTestingGiven`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=159218,cn1.name, NULL)) as `EverHadSexualIntercourse`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=159218,cn1.name, NULL)) as `BloodTransfusioninLast3Months`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=159218,cn1.name, NULL)) as `UnprotectedSexWithCasualPartnerinLast3Months`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165803,cn1.name, NULL)) as `UnprotectedSexWithRegularPartnerInTheLast3Months`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=164809,cn1.name, NULL)) as `STIinLast3Months`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165806,cn1.name, NULL)) as `MoreThan1SexPartnerDuringLast3Months`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=143264,cn1.name, NULL)) as `CurrentCough`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=832,cn1.name, NULL)) as `WeightLoss`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=140238,cn1.name, NULL)) as `Fever`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=133027,cn1.name, NULL)) as `NightSweats`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=124068,cn1.name, NULL)) as `ContactWithTBPatient`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165808,obs.value_numeric, NULL)) as `TBScreeningScore`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165809,cn1.name, NULL)) as `ComplaintsofVaginalDischargeorBurningWhenUrinating`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165810,cn1.name, NULL)) as `ComplaintsofLowerAbdominalPainsWithorWithoutVaginalDischarge`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165813,cn1.name, NULL)) as `ComplaintsofGenitalSoreOrSwollenInguinalLymphNodesWithorWithoutPains`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165814,obs.value_numeric, NULL)) as `STIScreeningScore`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165807,obs.value_numeric, NULL)) as `RiskAssesmentScore`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165840,cn1.name, NULL)) as `ScreeningTestResult`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165844,obs.value_datetime, NULL)) as `ScreeningTestDate`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165841,cn1.name, NULL)) as `ConfirmatoryTestResult`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165845,cn1.name, NULL)) as `ConfirmatoryTestDate`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165842,cn1.name, NULL)) as `TieBreaker`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165846,obs.value_datetime, NULL)) as `TieBreakerDate`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165843,cn1.name, NULL)) as `FinalResult`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165881,cn1.name, NULL)) as `HaveYouBeenTestedforHivBeforeWithinThisYear`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165818,cn1.name, NULL)) as `HIVRequestandResultFormSignedbyTester`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=164848,cn1.name, NULL)) as `ClientReceivedHIVTestResult`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=159382,cn1.name, NULL)) as `PostTestCounselingDone`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165883,cn1.name, NULL)) as `ClientUseFPMethodsOtherThanCondom`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=5571,cn1.name, NULL)) as ClientUseCondomsAsFPMethod, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=299,cn1.name, NULL)) as SyphilisTestResult, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=159430,cn1.name, NULL)) as HepatitisBVirusTestResult, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=161471,cn1.name, NULL)) as HepatitisCVirusTestResult, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=1648,cn1.name, NULL)) as ClientReferredtoOtherServices, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165820,cn1.name, NULL)) as RiskReductionPlanDeveloped, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165821,cn1.name, NULL)) as PostTestDisclosurePlanDeveloped, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165822,cn1.name, NULL)) as WillBringPartnerForHivTesting, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165823,cn1.name, NULL)) as WillBringOwnChildrenLessThan5YearsforHIVTesting, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165841,cn1.name, NULL)) as ProvidedWithInformationonFPandDualContraception, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=1382,cn1.name, NULL)) as CorrectCondomUseDemonstrated, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=159777,cn1.name, NULL)) as CondomsProvidedtoClient, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165045,obs.value_text, NULL)) as AdditionalComments, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=166242,obs.value_datetime, NULL)) as SignatureDate FROM obs LEFT JOIN patient ON(patient.patient_id=obs.person_id and obs.voided=0 and patient.voided=0) LEFT JOIN person ON(person.person_id=patient.patient_id and person.voided=0) LEFT join encounter enc on(enc.encounter_id=obs.encounter_id and enc.voided=0 and obs.voided=0 and enc.form_id=10) LEFT JOIN visit on (enc.visit_id=visit.visit_id and visit.voided=0) left join concept_name cn1 on(obs.value_coded=cn1.concept_id and cn1.locale='en' and cn1.locale_preferred=1) LEFT JOIN patient_identifier pid1 on(pid1.patient_id=patient.patient_id and patient.voided=0 and pid1.identifier_type=8 and pid1.voided=0) LEFT JOIN patient_identifier pid2 on(pid2.patient_id=patient.patient_id and patient.voided=0 and pid2.identifier_type=4 and pid2.voided=0) LEFT JOIN patient_identifier pid3 on(pid3.patient_id=patient.patient_id and patient.voided=0 and pid3.identifier_type=5 and pid3.voided=0) LEFT JOIN patient_identifier pid4 on(pid4.patient_id=patient.patient_id and patient.voided=0 and pid4.identifier_type=10 and pid4.voided=0) LEFT JOIN global_property on(global_property.property='facility_datim_code') WHERE patient.voided=0 and enc.voided=0 and enc.encounter_datetime BETWEEN :startDate and :endDate GROUP BY patient.patient_id, enc.encounter_id;
